meanings.definition: A layer placed between two other layers.
meanings.sent1: The cake had delicious chocolate interlayers.
meanings.sent2: The interlayers of the sandwich held the ingredients together.
meanings.sent3: The interlayers of cheese in the lasagna made it extra gooey.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like interlayers of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The interlayers of fog obscured the view of the mountains.

meanings.definition: To place a layer between two other layers.
meanings.sent1: She carefully interlayers the sheets of paper in the folder.
meanings.sent2: The chef interlayers the pasta with rich sauce and cheese.
meanings.sent3: He interlayers the blankets on the bed like a pro.
meanings.sent4: The artist interlayers colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The gardener interlayers soil and seeds to grow healthy plants.
